title: Pray for the man who paraded an Ola scooter through town with a donkey
content:
In what recalls a cinematic scene — like Cersei Lannister’s walk of atonement in Game of Thrones — a public shame parade took place on Sunday, featuring an escooter and a… donkey. A video of the incident in the Beed district of Maharashtra, India, shows a man tying his Ola escooter to a donkey and parading it around town with posters urging people not to trust the company.   View this post on Instagram   A post shared by LetsUpp Marathi (@letsupp.marathi) As reported by various Indian news outlets, the man in question, Sachin Gitte bought an electric scooter from…

This story continues at The Next Web
description: An Ola escooter owner in India made a bizarre protest after the company ignored his requests to fix his two-wheeler.
